Address.label: Address
Address.value: 41 SOUTH HIGH STREET,HUNTINGTON CENTER,HUNTINGTON CENTER, COLUMBUS, Ohio, 43287, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Huntington Bancshares is a regional bank holding company headquartered in Columbus, Ohio. The bank has a network of branches and ATMs across eight Midwestern states. Founded in 1866, Huntington National Bank and its affiliates provide consumer, small-business, commercial, treasury management, wealth management, brokerage, trust, and insurance services. Huntington also provides auto dealer, equipment finance, national settlement, and capital market services that extend beyond its core states.
